entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Stony Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:37 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -26.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stony Rapids Airport 07:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -26.4°C
Pressure: 102.7 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -29.7°C
Wind: W 24 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
